summary: REQ-8 is mostly addressed (header branding updated; index.html title updated but not exactly to just "Incognibro"). REQ-9 static robots.txt and sitemap.xml were added and index.html has SEO meta/description, but robots/sitemap contain placeholder domains and do not appear wired to the configurable canonical/base URL. REQ-10 has a setup guide and a frontend base URL config, but the guide content is truncated so IC-specific steps and the required Google-indexing disclaimer cannot be verified; backend custom-domain configuration APIs were added even though REQ-10 only required config/docs.

missing_requirements.requirement: In frontend/index.html, the <title> is updated to "Incognibro".
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the title set to "Incognibro - Privacy Dashboard" rather than exactly "Incognibro" as stated in the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend supports configuring the canonical/public base URL (so sitemap/canonical references can be correct when a custom domain is used).
missing_requirements.reason: A configurable base URL exists and canonical link is set at runtime, but the added static robots.txt and sitemap.xml still hardcode/placeholder "https://your-domain.com" and are not shown using the configured base URL, so sitemap/robots references will not be correct for a custom domain without manual file edits.

missing_requirements.requirement: Documentation explicitly notes that Google indexing is not immediate and depends on Google crawling after the site is publicly reachable.
missing_requirements.reason: A custom domain setup guide was added but its content is truncated in the diff summary before any mention of Google indexing; the required disclaimer cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Setup guide describes IC-specific steps for mapping a custom domain (DNS records and any IC-specific steps).
missing_requirements.reason: The setup guide is truncated in the diff summary; beyond an initial CNAME suggestion, additional IC-specific steps (if any) cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend custom-domain configuration state and admin APIs (proposeCustomDomain/updateCustomDomainConfig/getCustomDomainConfig) plus a migration adding customDomainConfig to canister state.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 only asks for documentation and frontend configurability for canonical/public base URL. The diff introduces new backend types/state and admin methods for custom domain management, which were not requested.
